scripts.db:view:local: wrangler d1 execute wedding-rsvp --local --command='SELECT * FROM rsvps ORDER BY created_at DESC'
scripts.db:view:remote: wrangler d1 execute wedding-rsvp --remote --command='SELECT * FROM rsvps ORDER BY created_at DESC'
scripts.db:count:local: wrangler d1 execute wedding-rsvp --local --command='SELECT COUNT(*) as total_rsvps, SUM(CASE WHEN attending = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as attending, SUM(CASE WHEN attending = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as not_attending FROM rsvps'
scripts.db:export:local: wrangler d1 execute wedding-rsvp --local --command='SELECT * FROM rsvps' --json > rsvps-export.json
scripts.pages:preview: npm run pages:build && wrangler pages dev
scripts.pages:deploy: npm run pages:build && wrangler pages deploy
